review_blob: Hopped up APA with enough malts to have a smooth dry finish. Great reddish copper color. One of my favorites
beer_name: Great Lakes Burning River Pale Ale

review_blob: Clean aroma, strong citrus taste with enough hippy flavor for the IPA interest. Very solid Ale
Dark stout in color, light is taste. Great taste without the heavy alcohol taste of some higher ABV stouts.
beer_name: Left Hand Fade To Black Vol. 5: Black Rye Ale

review_blob: Citrus aroma with outstanding west coast hippy taste. Nice IPA bitterness with great drinkability
beer_name: The Brew Kettle White Rajah IPA

review_blob: Amber appearance, Citrus smell, Dry hop and rich flavor. Thick textured mouth feel. Love this beer
